title: Sideband Pane Splitting - Execute spawn Commands via Sideband Protocol
description: Complete the execute_spawn function in the sideband executor to actually split panes when Claude outputs <ccmux:spawn /> commands. Currently the parser and command types exist but execution is a TODO stub.
user_impact: Enables Claude to dynamically create new terminal panes by outputting sideband commands, allowing parallel task execution and improved workflow automation
